synopsis.text:
Juntangâ€™s first day at Minsong University marks the beginning of a whirlwind of unexpected encounters and emotional complexities. Initially drawn to the university by his long-standing crush on Zhu Zhu, he finds himself living near Duna, a former idol with a mysterious past, who initially seems peculiar and unapproachable. Despite his initial reluctance, Juntang soon finds himself drawn into Duna's world, unaware of the emotional rollercoaster that awaits him.

As he navigates the complexities of college life, Juntang also reconnects with Zhu Zhu, who seems to maintain a careful distance despite being aware of his feelings. Adding to this emotional vortex is the entrance of Ruoni Cui, who develops feelings for Juntang after a daring party encounter. To complicate matters further, Juntang finds himself growing closer to Duna, blurring the lines of their friendship.

Meanwhile, Juntang discovers the harsh realities of Zhu Zhu's family life and the troubled past of Duna, forcing him to confront his tangled emotions and navigate the complex web of relationships he's found himself in.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
